00030 using namespace std;
00031 using namespace affx;
00032 
00033 void makeMapEpsilonTsv(std::string file_name,
00034                        const char* mapParameters[],
00035                        double mapEpsilons[])
00036 {
00037   affx::TsvFile datasetTsv;
00038   char string_buf[100];
00039 
00040   int col_cnt = 2;
00041   int row_cnt = 10;
00042 
00043   //Print Comment
00044   snprintf(string_buf,sizeof(string_buf),
00045            "'%s' %d rows, %d cols",
00046            file_name.c_str(),row_cnt,col_cnt);
00047   datasetTsv.addHeader("Note",string_buf);
00048 
00049   //Create Columns and their appropriate titles
00050   snprintf(string_buf,sizeof(string_buf),"MapParameter");
00051   datasetTsv.defineColumn(0,0,string_buf);
00052   datasetTsv.setPrecision(0,0,1);
00053 
00054   snprintf(string_buf,sizeof(string_buf),"MapEpsilon");
00055   datasetTsv.defineColumn(0,1,string_buf);
00056   datasetTsv.setPrecision(0,1,2);
00057 
00058   //Print out the template
00059   datasetTsv.writeTsv(file_name);
00060 
00061   //Fill the columns with Data
00062   int i = 0;
00063   while (mapParameters[i]!=NULL || mapEpsilons[i]!=0.0)
00064     {
00065       datasetTsv.set(0, 0, mapParameters[i]);
00066       datasetTsv.set(0, 1, mapEpsilons[i]);
00067       datasetTsv.writeLevel(0);
00068       i++;
00069     }
00070 
00071   datasetTsv.close();
00072 }
00073 
00074 void makeDatasetTsv(std::string file_name, const char* groupNames[], const char* tsvNames[])
00075 {
00076   affx::TsvFile datasetTsv;
00077   char string_buf[100];
00078 
00079   int col_cnt = 2;
00080   int row_cnt = 10;
00081 
00082   //Print Comment
00083   snprintf(string_buf,sizeof(string_buf),
00084            "'%s' %d rows, %d cols",
00085            file_name.c_str(),row_cnt,col_cnt);
00086   datasetTsv.addHeader("Note",string_buf);
00087 
00088   //Create Columns and their appropriate titles
00089   snprintf(string_buf,sizeof(string_buf),"GroupName");
00090   datasetTsv.defineColumn(0,0,string_buf);
00091   datasetTsv.setPrecision(0,0,1);
00092 
00093   snprintf(string_buf,sizeof(string_buf),"TsvName");
00094   datasetTsv.defineColumn(0,1,string_buf);
00095   datasetTsv.setPrecision(0,1,2);
00096 
00097   //Print out the template
00098   datasetTsv.writeTsv(file_name);
00099 
00100   //Fill the columns with Data
00101   int i = 0;
00102   while(groupNames[i]!= NULL || tsvNames[i]!=NULL)
00103     {
00104       datasetTsv.set(0, 0, groupNames[i]);
00105       datasetTsv.set(0, 1, tsvNames[i]);
00106       datasetTsv.writeLevel(0);
00107       i++;
00108     }
00109 
00110   datasetTsv.close();
00111 }

00113 void makeIgnoreColumnTsv(std::string file_name, const char* ignoreColumns[])
00114 {
00115   affx::TsvFile ignoreTsv;
00116   char string_buf[100];
00117 
00118   int col_cnt = 1;
00119   int row_cnt = 17;
00120 
00121   //Print Comment
00122   snprintf(string_buf,sizeof(string_buf),
00123            "'%s' %d rows, %d cols",
00124            file_name.c_str(),row_cnt,col_cnt);
00125   ignoreTsv.addHeader("Note",string_buf);
00126 
00127   //Create Columns and their appropriate titles
00128   snprintf(string_buf,sizeof(string_buf),"IgnoreColumns");
00129   ignoreTsv.defineColumn(0,0,string_buf);
00130   ignoreTsv.setPrecision(0,0,1);
00131 
00132 
00133   //Print out the template
00134   ignoreTsv.writeTsv(file_name);
00135 
00136   //Fill the columns with Data
00137   int i = 0;
00138   while(ignoreColumns[i] != NULL)
00139     {
00140       ignoreTsv.set(0, 0, ignoreColumns[i]);
00141       ignoreTsv.writeLevel(0);
00142       i++;
00143     }
00144 
00145   ignoreTsv.close();
00146 }

00159            "'%s' %d rows, %d cols",
00160            file_name.c_str(),row_cnt,col_cnt);

00166   ignoreTsv.setPrecision(0,0,1);
00167 
00168 
00169   //Print out the template
00170   ignoreTsv.writeTsv(file_name);
00171 
00172   //Fill the columns with Data
00173   int i = 0;

00185 int main()
00186 {
00187   const char* groupNames[] = {"SNPReference", "SNPReference","SNPReference",
00188                   "Cyto2", "Cyto2", "Cyto2",
00189                   "Cyto2", "Cyto2", "Cyto2",
00190                   "Cyto2",
00191                   NULL
00192   };
00193 
00194   const char* tsvNames[] = {"EMSNParameters", "EMSNArray", "SNPReference",
00195                 "AntigenomicProbes", "MedianSignals", "ProbeEffects",
00196                 "SNPPosteriors", "SketchCN", "SketchSNP",
00197                 "WaveCorretion",
00198                 NULL
00199   };
00200 
00201   const char* ignoreParameters[] = {
00202     "FileCreationTime", "FileIdentifier","program-version",
00203     "create_date", "create-date","affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-verbose",
00204     "affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-exec-guid", "affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-program-cvs-id","affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-version-to-report",
00205     "affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-command-line", "affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-mem-usage", "affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-run-probeset-genotype",
00206     "affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-cels", "affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-out-dir", "affymetrix-algorithm-param-state-time-start",
00207     "affymetrix-algorithm-param-state-free-mem-at-start", "affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-temp-dir",
00208     NULL
00209   };
00210 
00211   const char* mapParameters[] = {"Segments.CN.MeanMarkerDistance",
00212                  NULL
00213   };
00214   double mapEpsilons[] = {376.0f,
00215                    NULL
00216   };
00217 
00218   makeDatasetTsv("datasetFile.tsv", groupNames, tsvNames);
00219   makeIgnoreParamTsv("ignoreParamFile.tsv", ignoreParameters);
00220   makeIgnoreColumnTsv("ignoreColumnFile.tsv", ignoreParameters);
00221   makeMapEpsilonTsv("qt_mapEpsilonFile.tsv", mapParameters, mapEpsilons);
00222 }
